body.p: The IOM RMA REST API supports programmatic access to objects related to the Return Merchandise Authorization process.

ul.li: shop : API endpoints, that could be used by the shop.

entry.lines: The order number of the shop

row.entry: Authentication information is missing or invalid

section.title: Description
section.p: Returns a list of return requests for a given shopName and shopOrderNumber.

entry.lines: The order number of the shop

row.entry: Authentication information is missing or invalid

section.title: Description
section.p: Returns a return request for a given shopName, shopOrderNumber and returnRequestId.

entry.lines: The return request id of the related order
The order number of the shop

row.entry: Authentication information is missing or invalid

entry.lines: The return request id of the related order
The order number of the shop

row.entry: Authentication information is missing or invalid

section.title: Description
section.p: Returns a list of return request contact persons for a given returnRequestId, shopName and shopOrderNumber.

entry.lines: The return request id of the related order
The order number of the shop

row.entry: Authentication information is missing or invalid

section.title: Description
section.p: Returns a list of return request custom attributes for a given returnRequestId, shopName and shopOrderNumber.

entry.lines: The return request id of the related order
The order number of the shop

row.entry: Authentication information is missing or invalid

section.title: Description
section.p: Returns a list of return request pickup addresses for a given returnRequestId, shopName and shopOrderNumber.

entry.lines: The return request id of the related order
The order number of the shop

row.entry: Authentication information is missing or invalid

section.title: Description
section.p: Returns a list of return request positions for a given returnRequestId, shopName and shopOrderNumber.

entry.lines: The return request id of the related order
The order number of the shop

row.entry: Authentication information is missing or invalid

section.title: Description
section.p: Returns a return request position for a given returnRequestId, shopName, shopOrderNumber and a returnRequestPositionId.

entry.lines: The return request id of the related order
The return request position id of the related return request
The order number of the shop

row.entry: Authentication information is missing or invalid

section.title: Description
section.p: Returns a list of return request position items for a given returnRequestId, shopName and shopOrderNumber.

entry.lines: The return request id of the related order
The return request position id of the related return request
The order number of the shop

row.entry: Authentication information is missing or invalid

body.p: The business status of the return request.
Type: enum (ACCEPTED, IN_APPROVAL, READY_TO_APPROVE, REJECTED, UNKNOWN)
Represents a contact person of the return request from an order of a shop.

entry.lines: The name of the company of the contact person. Example: "Intershop Communication AG"
The email address of the contact person. Example: "john.doe@intershop.com"
The first name of the contact person. Example: "John"
The preferred correspondence language to answer the contact person. Example: "english"
The last name of the contact person. Example: "Doe"
The phone number of the contact person. Example: "0176 12345677"
Exception / Error message Example: "Attribute XYZ is mandatory"
Value which caused the exception / error

body.p: Detailed information about what went wrong

entry.lines: The HTTP status code applicable to this problem, expressed as a string value Example: 400

body.p: Represents a custom attribute (key/value pair) of a return request from an order of a shop.

entry.lines: The key of a custom attribute. Length: 1 - 250 Example: "Example Key"
The value of a custom attribute. Length: 1 - 1000 Example: "Example Value"

body.p: Represents a pickup address related to the return request from an order of a shop.

entry.lines: The first addition line related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 100 Example: "Finanz"
The second addition line related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 100 Example: "3.Floor"
The city name related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 100 Example: "Berlin"
The name of the company of the pickup adress. Length: 1 - 100 Example: "Intershop Communication AG"
The ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code for the country name related to the pickup address. Example: "DEU"
The district related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 100 Example: "Berlin"
The first name related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 50 Example: "John"
The house number related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 20 Example: "28"
The last name related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 50 Example: "Doe"
The post code related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 25 Example: "12053"
The name of the street related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 100 Example: "Alexstraße"

body.p: Represents a return request from a shop.

entry.lines: The comment of the return request. Length: 0 - 255 Example: "The battery is draining quickly"
The date when the return request was created.
The actual number of the return request. Length: 1 - 50 Example: "10901095"
The name of the shop. Example: "Test Shop US DE"
The order number as used by the shop. Example: "20180303123"
The name of the supplier. Example: "Test Supplier US DE"
The order number as used by the supplier. Example: "20180303321"

body.p: Represents a return request item of a return request from an order of a shop.

entry.lines: The return request item identifier. Example: 10000
The serial number of the product. Length: 1 - 70 Example: "W88401231AX"

body.p: Represents a return request position of a return request from an order of a shop.

entry.lines: The return request position identifier. Example: 10000
The posistion number as used by the shop. Example: 1
The product name as used by the shop. Example: "test_product_1"
The product number as used by the shop. Length: 1 - 50 Example: "20180303123"
The quantity of the related product by the shop. Minimum value: 1 Example: 1
The reason for the return. Example: "RET100"
The article number as used by the supplier. Example: "20180303123"

body.p: The technical status of the return request.
Type: enum (ACCEPTED, CLOSED, DO_APPROVE, DO_CLOSE, INITIAL, REJECTED)
The status of the approval.
Type: enum (APPROVED, NOT_APPROVED)
The type that specifies the return request.
Type: enum (RETURN, PICKUP)
Represents an approval of a return request of an order of a shop.

entry.lines: The comment for the approval. Example: "The return request reasons are not convincing."

body.p: Represents a custom attribute (key/value pair) of a return request from an order of a shop.

entry.lines: The key of a custom attribute. Length: 1 - 250 Example: "Example Key"
The value of a custom attribute. Length: 1 - 1000 Example: "Example Value"

body.p: Represents a pickup address related to the return request from an order of a shop.

entry.lines: The first addition line related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 100 Example: "Finanz"
The second addition line related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 100 Example: "3.Floor"
The city name related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 100 Example: "Berlin"
The name of the company of the pickup adress. Length: 1 - 100 Example: "Intershop Communication AG"
The ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code for the country name related to the pickup address. Example: "DEU"
The district related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 100 Example: "Berlin"
The first name related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 50 Example: "John"
The house number related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 20 Example: "28"
The last name related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 50 Example: "Doe"
The post code related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 25 Example: "12053"
The name of the street related to the pickup address. Length: 1 - 100 Example: "Alexstraße"

body.p: Represents a return request from a shop.

entry.lines: The comment of the return request. Length: 0 - 255 Example: "The battery is draining quickly"
The actual number of the return request. Length: 1 - 50 Example: "10901095"

body.p: Represents a return request item of a return request from an order of a shop.

entry.lines: The serial number of the product. Length: 1 - 70 Example: "W88401231AX"

body.p: Represents a return request position of a return request from an order of a shop.

entry.lines: The posistion number as used by the shop. Example: 1
The product number as used by the shop. Length: 1 - 50 Example: "20180303123"
The quantity of the related product by the shop. Minimum value: 1 Example: 1
The reason for the return. Example: "RET100"

body.p: Type: enum (http, https)
Type: basic
